query:
SELECT COALESCE(
                    (SELECT SUM(home_score) FROM games WHERE season_id = $1 AND home_team_id = $2 AND status = 'evaluated'),
                    0
                ) + COALESCE(
                    (SELECT SUM(away_score) FROM games WHERE season_id = $1 AND away_team_id = $2 AND status = 'evaluated'),
                    0
                ) as "total!"
